title: Ep 8: Reyhan Harmanci
itunes:title: Ep 8: Reyhan Harmanci
itunes:subtitle: Welcome to Reyhan Harmanci! Reyhan is the deputy head of programming at Gimlet and joins us a mere two days before giving birth to her daughter, Lois. (Mom and baby are doing great!). Reyhan has always wanted to be the kind of gal who carried a leather...
description:
Welcome to Reyhan Harmanci! Reyhan is the deputy head of programming at Gimlet and joins us a mere two days before giving birth to her daughter, Lois. (Mom and baby are doing great!). Reyhan has always wanted to be the kind of gal who carried a leather bag but she had a real “know thyself” moment when she purchased her product pick. Caroline evangelizes her favorite skincare product from Trader Joe’s and we learn who cares the most about skincare in Reyhan’s house. 


Products in this episode:

  • Baggu Duck Bag: https://fave.co/2L4MQjI 
  • MZ Wallace Tote: https://fave.co/2rkAugy 
  • Trader Joe’s Hyaluronic Moisture Boost Serum: https://fave.co/375MXUA 
  • Madewell Transport Backpack: https://fave.co/2PTcY3W 


The funny tweet about physical therapists that Caroline butchered in her retelling: https://twitter.com/ftrain/status/1175024177746776066?s=21


Thanks for listening! Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


Check out all of the recommended products by past guests, listeners and Caroline at www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 


Shop the spreadsheet (updated with new recs all of the time!): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vdIkPMWhV0FlRux3u_DVpuGvakQxkF3EbYT2ZVv45B8/edit#gid=0


Want to get in touch more formally? Email: Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com


Follow Reyhan on Twitter at www.twitter.com/harmancipants   


Follow Caroline on Twitter at www.twitter.com/carolinemoss


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
